items.title: MrBeast Employee Fined, Suspended by Kalshi for Insider Trading on YouTube Videos
items.summary: Kalshi revealed its first enforcement actions Wednesday, against a political candidate and an employee of YouTube star MrBeast.

items.title: Solana leads crypto recovery with 10% gain: Is $100 SOL price next?

items.title: Circle beats Q4 earnings estimates as USDC supply jumps 72%; shares surge 20%

items.title: Bitcoin treasury firm GD Culture set to sell BTC holdings to fund share buybacks
items.summary: The company's stock has lost about two-thirds of its value since peaking last year, nearly in step with bitcoin's record price above $126,000.

items.summary: 21Shares debuts the Strategy Yield ETP on Euronext Amsterdam on Thursday, giving Europe regulated access to Strategy’s preferred stock, which is heavily backed by Bitcoin.

items.title: Revolut among 4 companies chosen to test stablecoins in UK sandbox
